code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AvisoLegal(){const[texto,setTexto]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/avisoLegal.txt').then(res=>res.text()).then(setTexto).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:900,margin:'110px auto 40px auto'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Aviso Legal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{background:'#f8f8f8',padding:18,borderRadius:8,marginBottom:24,maxHeight:500,overflowY:'auto',fontSize:14},children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Cargando..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{style:{whiteSpace:'pre-wrap',fontFamily:'inherit'},children:texto})})]});}export default AvisoLegal;
